entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Laurentides (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: L'Étape 9:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Temperature: -7.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -8.3°C
Wind: ESE 11 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
